title: [CY] Your appeal has been submitted
imageAlt: [CY] A picture of the track your appeal progress bar

next.heading: [CY] What happens next
next.notify: [CY] DWP will be notified that you want to appeal against their decision. You’ll be told the next steps when DWP have responded.
next.contact: [CY] The tribunal may need to contact you and ask you some additional questions. It’s important that you reply as soon as you can.

email: [CY] If you've signed up for emails or SMS and have chosen to attend a hearing, then you'll get a message within 3 working days with a link so you can track your appeal online.

appeal.srText: [CY] Appeal received. This step is complete.

response.srText: [CY] DWP respond to your appeal. This has not happened yet.

hearingBooked.srText: [CY] Hearing booked. This has not happened yet.

hearing.srText: [CY] Hearing for your appeal. This has not happened yet.

decision.srText: [CY] A tribunal makes a decision on your appeal. This stage has not happened yet.
